short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces every instance of 'millennial' and 'baby boomer' with what the The Man really means.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The bourgeoisie have concealed their contempt of the proletariat by focusing their ire on "millennials". This addon removes this shroud of deception, and reveals who "they" are really talking about.
